My Career

Wasatch Electric, a Division of Dynalectric Co.

1. Oversaw proposal planning and administration of contracts for up to 10 projects weekly.
2. Implemented company-wide Business Opportunity Log and Bid Tracking System, leading to a sharp reduction of unnecessary staff meetings.
3. Produced labor productivity reports in coordination with Project Managers to cut costs on current and future projects.
4. Analyzed blueprints, construction drawings and material and labor requirements to prepare project estimates using MC2.
5. Slashed construction cost by 15% on average by negotiating with subcontractors and vendors.
6. Ensured contractor complies with owner specifications and government regulations.

Oct. 2014 - Dec. 2015
Administrative Assistant

4. Compiled monthly reports and department metrics to reach decisions on charge-off and stop advance approvals.

Senior Investor Reporting Analyst

Select Portfolio Servicing, Inc.

1. Oversee reporting process for securitization and investor reporting. Proactively identify data quality and integrity issues that affect the accuracy of reporting.
2. Ensure that the staff is adequately trained and any cross training necessary to promote segregation of duties is complete and fully implemented.
3. Create VBA macros to automate monthly reporting.
4. Expedite accurate and timely remittances for all bank investors.
5. Review department operational procedures to identify and implement projects to reduce operational and FTE expenses and increase productivity.
6. Interact with other departmental managers to ensure new servicing/reporting requirements are in place and functioning as expected.

Aug. 2021 - Present
